comment._content: Poor Little Children.  Jesus says:   Suffer Not the Little Children.   So sad.

comment.author: 59890603@N07
comment._content:
We don't know how bad or good their life was.
I've spoken to people who were poor kids back then, yes they didn't have much but they were happy.
These kids experienced a freedom modern kids will never experience, being able to play outside in the streets all day, not being too fussy about getting dirty, having adventures in a neighbourhood where you feel safe because you know everyone, being happy with a piece of candy, etc.
Are they worse off then modern kids who are spoiled rotten but spend their entire day indoors behind a computer or tv, who cant go outside because it is dangerous or there is too much traffic, kids who are worried about racism, the environment, terrorism, are obsessed about appearance and having the latest mobile phone?
